name: Alice, catch the cat!
description:
Alice is lost in the woods, you need to catch the right Cheshire cat and help Alice to get out!

Each some time new smogs appear on the platforms.. who are hidden behind them? Cats or cards? You can catch the cats and get smiles (like a bullets). If you don't hurry up, the cat will disappear!

Game with one level and different difficulties. 

Picked up cat - two smiles (bullets), picked up smile - one smile :) Every 100 scores - new live (but not more than five). Catch the Cheshire cat to get a 1 000 000 scores and end the game. Or die.

Lleft, right, up arrows - you know what it means. S - attack with a smile.

Created for the LibGDX Jam march 2021.
